1.0.name: wordpress/category-post-list-widget
1.0.description: Category Post List Widget is a light widget which displays the most recent posts from a certain category. Features: 1. Set the category from which the posts should come. 2. Set Widget dimensions to display post of selected category on front end. 3. Set number of posts to show. 4. Option to change ordering of posts. 5. Option to change sort type of posts (can set sort by date, title, number of comments, random). 6. Option to select different effects. 7. Option to show the post excerpt and how long the excerpt should be. 8. Option to select different display options. 9. Set Thumbnail size. 10. Set different date format.
